title: Looking for gold+ mid laner for dedicated 5s team
body:
Hello! My ranked team is currently looking for a mid laner. We are a very dedicated team that is trying to go pro. IF you would like to join, please read below =).
Requirements:

Must be very dedicated and willing to practice we are a team that is aiming to go pro
Must be able to play on Saturdays at 5pm est(preferable have time for at least 5 matches)
Must be able to play at least 3 days a week from 6:30pm-8:30pm est(EXCLUDING SATURDAY)
Must be gold+
Must be a Mid
Must be mature
Must have Teamspeak
Availability is very important
MUST TAKE THIS SERIOUSLY, in our team we practice our roles a lot in solo que and normals, we expect our players to treat this almost as if it were a real sport

Just post your availability, champs ,role and rank etc below or add me in game and message me :)

replies.body:
IGN: Cruisawooksi
Current Rank: Gold IV
Availability: Central Timezone Usually 4 pm till about 11pm
Age: 21
Role: Mid
Champs: {{champion:103}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:143}} 
Microphone/Ts: yes, also got Curse, and raidcall
Why Should I Be Chosen: I really love playing league and I feel like I'm ready to take it to the next level and go as far as I can while learning more and more about the game and bettering myself along the way.
My One Weakness: The Mid/late game cs and sometimes I get tunnel vision

Looking forward to hearing back for you guys!

Hey!

I would definitely like to try out for you! I've been playing since season 2 now and I want to get involved and play for a ranked team to improve as a player!!

IGN: LostBast
Availability: EST timezone evenings (6p.m. or later).
Age: 21
Role applying for: Mid
Champion Pool: Annie, Ori, Liss, Vel, Anivia, Azir, Ahri, I like the mage style of play
Microphone/Ts: Yes!
Why I should be chosen?: I love playing the game and really want to take it to the next level. I'm a team-player and I can keep a cool head, I never surrender, nor do I cry!
Your one weakness?: Maintaining high cs throughout the entire game (tends to fall off midgame), though I am actively working on improving it.

I look forward to receive a response in game!

-LB

-- Summoner Name: Basic Account
-- Current rank/elo: G5
-- Age:34
-- times available:evenings except wed.
-- Role applying for:mid
-- Top 5 champs in role: kat, ahri, aniv, malz, annie, gp, teemo
-- Playstyle:strategic
-- Past experience with teams:played on many teams, including alien wear tourny teams, and esl
-- Why are you interested in us:looking for active teamates
